title: Aw hmangaihna va thûk èm
lyrics:
1. Aw hmangaihna a va thuk em!
Mi sual dum ber min silfaina chu;
Anchhedawng Kraws ka tan malsawmna,
Van Lalber thihna Kraws ka tan damna.

Lei leh vana roreltu,
Kraws lera tuihala au kha;
Vana Lalber ranthlenga zal hi,
Eng dang vang a ni lo; keimah vang a ni.

2. Aw hmangaihna a va sang em!
Ka hril seng lo min hmangaihna hi,
Ka aw neih zawng i hming ropui nan,
Min hmangaihtu Lalpa, ka hmangaih che.

3. Aw hmangaihna a va zau em!
I lalțhutthleng ropui kalsan a;
Lei hrehawma i lo kal mai hi
Aw a va ropui em! ka hril seng lo.

4. Aw hmangaihna a va mak em!
Ka chhiar seng lo min enkawlna hi;
Aw, mi tling lote min thlang chhuakin,
Țawmkai lo berte pawh min hmang țhin a
